title: Diabetes camp operation education through nursing service-learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and basic principles of patient care
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones, but the design must maximize educational effectiveness in limited PC environments. Includes diabetes camp simulations and community-linked activities.

learning_goals: Identify and explain daily management requirements of diabetic patients with 80% accuracy
Design and implement at least one community-based health education program through a service-learning project
Practice effective communication skills at least three times in patient-family-medical staff collaboration scenarios
Achieve a 20% or greater improvement in self-management ability as measured by pre- and post-diabetes camp operation surveys

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) Access Permissions for Smartphones
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
